Plot: A florist, who abides by a strict five-date-limit with any man, finds herself wanting more with the new restaurateur in town.
Title: I Hate Valentine's Day
Writer: Nia Vardalos (screenplay), Nia Vardalos (story), Stephen David (story), Ben Zook (story)
Actors: Nia Vardalos, John Corbett, Stephen Guarino, Amir Arison
tomatoConsensus: This boilerplate comedy lacks ingenuity or humor and features mediocre dialogue that sounds less like conversation and more like stand-up shtick.
